title: Skiing's different
creator_credit: Department of Home Affairs, Edwin Moses, Peter Johnson, Film Australia and Motion Picture Associates
brief_description: Examines possible skiing accidents and the way in which the right clothes, correctly fitting equipment, and commonsense can prevent disaster on the slopes. Narrated by Barry Eaton
